title: Recovery Weekend with Recluse Cigars
itunes:title: Recovery Weekend with Recluse Cigars
description:
We are in recovery mode after the Two Guys Smoke Shop 31st Anniversary extravaganza, Let’s Make A Smoking Deal. What better way to recover then with Scott Weeks from Recluse Cigars. 

We will fire up the reigning Cigar of the Year and hear all about the crazy shenanigans at the 31st Anniversary. 

All this and more on this week’s episode of The Cigar Authority.
